00078 /******************** open sound operator ********************/
00079 
00080 static int sound_open_cancel(bContext *UNUSED(C), wmOperator *op)
00081 {
00082     MEM_freeN(op->customdata);
00083     op->customdata= NULL;
00084     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00085 }
00086 
00087 static void sound_open_init(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00088 {
00089     PropertyPointerRNA *pprop;
00090 
00091     op->customdata= pprop= MEM_callocN(sizeof(PropertyPointerRNA), "OpenPropertyPointerRNA");
00092     uiIDContextProperty(C, &pprop->ptr, &pprop->prop);
00093 }
00094 
00095 #ifdef WITH_AUDASPACE
00096 static int sound_open_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00097 {
00098     char path[FILE_MAX];
00099     bSound *sound;
00100     PropertyPointerRNA *pprop;
00101     PointerRNA idptr;
00102     AUD_SoundInfo info;
00103     Main *bmain = CTX_data_main(C);
00104 
00105     RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "filepath", path);
00106     sound = sound_new_file(bmain, path);
00107 
00108     if (!op->customdata)
00109         sound_open_init(C, op);
00110 
00111     if (sound==NULL || sound->playback_handle == NULL) {
00112         if (op->customdata) MEM_freeN(op->customdata);
00113         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Unsupported audio format");
00114         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00115     }
00116 
00117     info = AUD_getInfo(sound->playback_handle);
00118 
00119     if (info.specs.channels == AUD_CHANNELS_INVALID) {
00120         sound_delete(bmain, sound);
00121         if (op->customdata) MEM_freeN(op->customdata);
00122         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Unsupported audio format");
00123         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00124     }
00125 
00126     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "mono")) {
00127         sound->flags |= SOUND_FLAGS_MONO;
00128         sound_load(bmain, sound);
00129     }
00130 
00131     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "cache")) {
00132         sound_cache(sound);
00133     }
00134 
00135     /* hook into UI */
00136     pprop= op->customdata;
00137 
00138     if (pprop->prop) {
00139         /* when creating new ID blocks, use is already 1, but RNA
00140          * pointer se also increases user, so this compensates it */
00141         sound->id.us--;
00142 
00143         RNA_id_pointer_create(&sound->id, &idptr);
00144         RNA_property_pointer_set(&pprop->ptr, pprop->prop, idptr);
00145         RNA_property_update(C, &pprop->ptr, pprop->prop);
00146     }
00147 
00148     if (op->customdata) MEM_freeN(op->customdata);
00149     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00150 }
00151 
00152 #else //WITH_AUDASPACE
00153 
00154 static int sound_open_exec(bContext *UNUSED(C), wmOperator *op)
00155 {
00156     BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Compiled without sound support");
00157 
00158     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00159 }
00160 
00161 #endif
00162 
00163 static int sound_open_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00164 {
00165     if (RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "filepath"))
00166         return sound_open_exec(C, op);
00167 
00168     sound_open_init(C, op);
00169 
00170     return WM_operator_filesel(C, op, event);
00171 }
00172 
00173 static void SOUND_OT_open(wmOperatorType *ot)
00174 {
00175     /* identifiers */
00176     ot->name = "Open Sound";
00177     ot->description = "Load a sound file";
00178     ot->idname = "SOUND_OT_open";
00179 
00180     /* api callbacks */
00181     ot->exec = sound_open_exec;
00182     ot->invoke = sound_open_invoke;
00183     ot->cancel = sound_open_cancel;
00184 
00185     /* flags */
00186     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00187 
00188     /* properties */
00189     WM_operator_properties_filesel(ot, FOLDERFILE|SOUNDFILE|MOVIEFILE, FILE_SPECIAL, FILE_OPENFILE, WM_FILESEL_FILEPATH | WM_FILESEL_RELPATH, FILE_DEFAULTDISPLAY);
00190     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "cache", FALSE, "Cache", "Cache the sound in memory");
00191     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "mono", FALSE, "Mono", "Mixdown the sound to mono");
00192 }
00193 
00194 static void SOUND_OT_open_mono(wmOperatorType *ot)
00195 {
00196     /* identifiers */
00197     ot->name = "Open Sound Mono";
00198     ot->description = "Load a sound file as mono";
00199     ot->idname = "SOUND_OT_open_mono";
00200 
00201     /* api callbacks */
00202     ot->exec = sound_open_exec;
00203     ot->invoke = sound_open_invoke;
00204     ot->cancel = sound_open_cancel;
00205 
00206     /* flags */
00207     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00208 
00209     /* properties */
00210     WM_operator_properties_filesel(ot, FOLDERFILE|SOUNDFILE|MOVIEFILE, FILE_SPECIAL, FILE_OPENFILE, WM_FILESEL_FILEPATH | WM_FILESEL_RELPATH, FILE_DEFAULTDISPLAY);
00211     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "cache", FALSE, "Cache", "Cache the sound in memory");
00212     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "mono", TRUE, "Mono", "Mixdown the sound to mono");
00213 }

00215 /* ******************************************************* */
00216 
00217 static int sound_update_animation_flags_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00218 {
00219     Sequence* seq;
00220     Scene* scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00221     struct FCurve* fcu;
00222     char driven;
00223 
00224     SEQ_BEGIN(scene->ed, seq) {
00225         fcu = id_data_find_fcurve(&scene->id, seq, &RNA_Sequence, "volume", 0, &driven);
00226         if (fcu || driven)
00227             seq->flag |= SEQ_AUDIO_VOLUME_ANIMATED;
00228         else
00229             seq->flag &= ~SEQ_AUDIO_VOLUME_ANIMATED;
00230 
00231         fcu = id_data_find_fcurve(&scene->id, seq, &RNA_Sequence, "pitch", 0, &driven);
00232         if (fcu || driven)
00233             seq->flag |= SEQ_AUDIO_PITCH_ANIMATED;
00234         else
00235             seq->flag &= ~SEQ_AUDIO_PITCH_ANIMATED;
00236 
00237         fcu = id_data_find_fcurve(&scene->id, seq, &RNA_Sequence, "pan", 0, &driven);
00238         if (fcu || driven)
00239             seq->flag |= SEQ_AUDIO_PAN_ANIMATED;
00240         else
00241             seq->flag &= ~SEQ_AUDIO_PAN_ANIMATED;
00242     }
00243     SEQ_END
00244 
00245     fcu = id_data_find_fcurve(&scene->id, scene, &RNA_Scene, "audio_volume", 0, &driven);
00246     if (fcu || driven)
00247         scene->audio.flag |= AUDIO_VOLUME_ANIMATED;
00248     else
00249         scene->audio.flag &= ~AUDIO_VOLUME_ANIMATED;
00250 
00251     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00252 }
00253 
00254 static void SOUND_OT_update_animation_flags(wmOperatorType *ot)
00255 {
00256     /*
00257      * This operator is needed to set a correct state of the sound animation
00258      * System. Unfortunately there's no really correct place to call the exec
00259      * function, that's why I made it an operator that's only visible in the
00260      * search menu. Apart from that the bake animation operator calls it too.
00261      */
00262 
00263     /* identifiers */
00264     ot->name = "Update animation";
00265     ot->description = "Update animation flags";
00266     ot->idname = "SOUND_OT_update_animation_flags";
00267 
00268     /* api callbacks */
00269     ot->exec = sound_update_animation_flags_exec;
00270 
00271     /* flags */
00272     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER;
00273 }
00274 
00275 /* ******************************************************* */
00276 
00277 static int sound_bake_animation_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00278 {
00279     Main* bmain = CTX_data_main(C);
00280     Scene* scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00281     int oldfra = scene->r.cfra;
00282     int cfra;
00283 
00284     sound_update_animation_flags_exec(C, NULL);
00285 
00286     for (cfra = (scene->r.sfra > 0) ? (scene->r.sfra - 1) : 0; cfra <= scene->r.efra + 1; cfra++) {
00287         scene->r.cfra = cfra;
00288         scene_update_for_newframe(bmain, scene, scene->lay);
00289     }
00290 
00291     scene->r.cfra = oldfra;
00292     scene_update_for_newframe(bmain, scene, scene->lay);
00293 
00294     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00295 }
00296 
00297 static void SOUND_OT_bake_animation(wmOperatorType *ot)
00298 {
00299     /* identifiers */
00300     ot->name = "Update animation cache";
00301     ot->description = "Update the audio animation cache";
00302     ot->idname = "SOUND_OT_bake_animation";
00303 
00304     /* api callbacks */
00305     ot->exec = sound_bake_animation_exec;
00306 
00307     /* flags */
00308     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER;
00309 }

00311 
00312 /******************** mixdown operator ********************/
00313 
00314 static int sound_mixdown_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00315 {
00316 #ifdef WITH_AUDASPACE
00317     char path[FILE_MAX];
00318     char filename[FILE_MAX];
00319     Scene *scene;
00320     Main *bmain;
00321 
00322     int bitrate, accuracy;
00323     AUD_DeviceSpecs specs;
00324     AUD_Container container;
00325     AUD_Codec codec;
00326     const char* result;
00327 
00328     sound_bake_animation_exec(C, op);
00329 
00330     RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "filepath", path);
00331     bitrate = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "bitrate") * 1000;
00332     accuracy = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "accuracy");
00333     specs.format = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "format");
00334     container = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "container");
00335     codec = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "codec");
00336     scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00337     bmain = CTX_data_main(C);
00338     specs.channels = scene->r.ffcodecdata.audio_channels;
00339     specs.rate = scene->r.ffcodecdata.audio_mixrate;
00340 
00341     BLI_strncpy(filename, path, sizeof(filename));
00342     BLI_path_abs(filename, bmain->name);
00343 
00344     result = AUD_mixdown(scene->sound_scene, SFRA * specs.rate / FPS, (EFRA - SFRA) * specs.rate / FPS,
00345                          accuracy, filename, specs, container, codec, bitrate);
00346 
00347     if (result) {
00348         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, result);
00349         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00350     }
00351 #else // WITH_AUDASPACE
00352     (void)C;
00353     (void)op;
00354 #endif // WITH_AUDASPACE
00355     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00356 }
00357 
00358 static int sound_mixdown_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00359 {
00360     if (RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "filepath"))
00361         return sound_mixdown_exec(C, op);
00362 
00363     return WM_operator_filesel(C, op, event);
00364 }
00365 
00366 #ifdef WITH_AUDASPACE
00367 
00368 static int sound_mixdown_draw_check_prop(PointerRNA *UNUSED(ptr), PropertyRNA *prop)
00369 {
00370     const char *prop_id= RNA_property_identifier(prop);
00371     return !(   strcmp(prop_id, "filepath") == 0 ||
00372                 strcmp(prop_id, "directory") == 0 ||
00373                 strcmp(prop_id, "filename") == 0
00374     );
00375 }
00376 
00377 static void sound_mixdown_draw(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00378 {
00379     static EnumPropertyItem pcm_format_items[] = {
00380         {AUD_FORMAT_U8, "U8", 0, "U8", "8 bit unsigned"},
00381         {AUD_FORMAT_S16, "S16", 0, "S16", "16 bit signed"},
00382 #ifdef WITH_SNDFILE
00383         {AUD_FORMAT_S24, "S24", 0, "S24", "24 bit signed"},
00384 #endif
00385         {AUD_FORMAT_S32, "S32", 0, "S32", "32 bit signed"},
00386         {AUD_FORMAT_FLOAT32, "F32", 0, "F32", "32 bit floating point"},
00387         {AUD_FORMAT_FLOAT64, "F64", 0, "F64", "64 bit floating point"},
00388         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00389 
00390     static EnumPropertyItem mp3_format_items[] = {
00391         {AUD_FORMAT_S16, "S16", 0, "S16", "16 bit signed"},
00392         {AUD_FORMAT_S32, "S32", 0, "S32", "32 bit signed"},
00393         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00394 
00395     static EnumPropertyItem ac3_format_items[] = {
00396         {AUD_FORMAT_S16, "S16", 0, "S16", "16 bit signed"},
00397         {AUD_FORMAT_FLOAT32, "F32", 0, "F32", "32 bit floating point"},
00398         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00399 
00400 #ifdef WITH_SNDFILE
00401     static EnumPropertyItem flac_format_items[] = {
00402         {AUD_FORMAT_S16, "S16", 0, "S16", "16 bit signed"},
00403         {AUD_FORMAT_S24, "S24", 0, "S24", "24 bit signed"},
00404         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00405 #endif
00406 
00407     static EnumPropertyItem all_codec_items[] = {
00408         {AUD_CODEC_AAC, "AAC", 0, "AAC", "Advanced Audio Coding"},
00409         {AUD_CODEC_AC3, "AC3", 0, "AC3", "Dolby Digital ATRAC 3"},
00410         {AUD_CODEC_FLAC, "FLAC", 0, "FLAC", "Free Lossless Audio Codec"},
00411         {AUD_CODEC_MP2, "MP2", 0, "MP2", "MPEG-1 Audio Layer II"},
00412         {AUD_CODEC_MP3, "MP3", 0, "MP3", "MPEG-2 Audio Layer III"},
00413         {AUD_CODEC_PCM, "PCM", 0, "PCM", "Pulse Code Modulation (RAW)"},
00414         {AUD_CODEC_VORBIS, "VORBIS", 0, "Vorbis", "Xiph.Org Vorbis Codec"},
00415         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00416 
00417     static EnumPropertyItem ogg_codec_items[] = {
00418         {AUD_CODEC_FLAC, "FLAC", 0, "FLAC", "Free Lossless Audio Codec"},
00419         {AUD_CODEC_VORBIS, "VORBIS", 0, "Vorbis", "Xiph.Org Vorbis Codec"},
00420         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00421 
00422     uiLayout *layout = op->layout;
00423     wmWindowManager *wm= CTX_wm_manager(C);
00424     PointerRNA ptr;
00425     PropertyRNA *prop_format;
00426     PropertyRNA *prop_codec;
00427     PropertyRNA *prop_bitrate;
00428 
00429     AUD_Container container = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "container");
00430     AUD_Codec codec = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "codec");
00431 
00432     prop_format = RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "format");
00433     prop_codec = RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "codec");
00434     prop_bitrate = RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "bitrate");
00435 
00436     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop_bitrate, PROP_HIDDEN);
00437     RNA_def_property_flag(prop_codec, PROP_HIDDEN);
00438     RNA_def_property_flag(prop_format, PROP_HIDDEN);
00439 
00440     switch(container)
00441     {
00442     case AUD_CONTAINER_AC3:
00443         RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop_format, PROP_HIDDEN);
00444         RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop_format, ac3_format_items);
00445         RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop_codec, all_codec_items);
00446         RNA_enum_set(op->ptr, "codec", AUD_CODEC_AC3);
00447         break;
00448     case AUD_CONTAINER_FLAC:
00449         RNA_def_property_flag(prop_bitrate, PROP_HIDDEN);
00450         RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop_codec, all_codec_items);
00451         RNA_enum_set(op->ptr, "codec", AUD_CODEC_FLAC);
00452 #ifdef WITH_SNDFILE
00453         RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop_format, PROP_HIDDEN);
00454         RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop_format, flac_format_items);
00455 #else
00456         RNA_enum_set(op->ptr, "format", AUD_FORMAT_S16);
00457 #endif
00458         break;
00459     case AUD_CONTAINER_MATROSKA:
00460         RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop_codec, PROP_HIDDEN);
00461         RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop_codec, all_codec_items);
00462 
00463         switch(codec)
00464         {
00465         case AUD_CODEC_AAC:
00466             RNA_enum_set(op->ptr, "format", AUD_FORMAT_S16);
00467             break;
00468         case AUD_CODEC_AC3:
00469             RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop_format, ac3_format_items);
00470             RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop_format, PROP_HIDDEN);
00471             break;
00472         case AUD_CODEC_FLAC:
00473             RNA_def_property_flag(prop_bitrate, PROP_HIDDEN);
00474             RNA_enum_set(op->ptr, "format", AUD_FORMAT_S16);
00475             break;
00476         case AUD_CODEC_MP2:
00477             RNA_enum_set(op->ptr, "format", AUD_FORMAT_S16);
00478             break;
00479         case AUD_CODEC_MP3:
00480             RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop_format, mp3_format_items);
00481             RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop_format, PROP_HIDDEN);
00482             break;
00483         case AUD_CODEC_PCM:
00484             RNA_def_property_flag(prop_bitrate, PROP_HIDDEN);
00485             RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop_format, pcm_format_items);
00486             RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop_format, PROP_HIDDEN);
00487             break;
00488         case AUD_CODEC_VORBIS:
00489             RNA_enum_set(op->ptr, "format", AUD_FORMAT_S16);
00490             break;
00491         default:
00492             break;
00493         }
00494 
00495         break;
00496     case AUD_CONTAINER_MP2:
00497         RNA_enum_set(op->ptr, "format", AUD_FORMAT_S16);
00498         RNA_enum_set(op->ptr, "codec", AUD_CODEC_MP2);
00499         RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop_codec, all_codec_items);
00500         break;
00501     case AUD_CONTAINER_MP3:
00502         RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop_format, PROP_HIDDEN);
00503         RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop_format, mp3_format_items);
00504         RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop_codec, all_codec_items);
00505         RNA_enum_set(op->ptr, "codec", AUD_CODEC_MP3);
00506         break;
00507     case AUD_CONTAINER_OGG:
00508         RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop_codec, PROP_HIDDEN);
00509         RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop_codec, ogg_codec_items);
00510         RNA_enum_set(op->ptr, "format", AUD_FORMAT_S16);
00511         break;
00512     case AUD_CONTAINER_WAV:
00513         RNA_def_property_flag(prop_bitrate, PROP_HIDDEN);
00514         RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop_format, PROP_HIDDEN);
00515         RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop_format, pcm_format_items);
00516         RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop_codec, all_codec_items);
00517         RNA_enum_set(op->ptr, "codec", AUD_CODEC_PCM);
00518         break;
00519     default:
00520         break;
00521     }
00522 
00523     RNA_pointer_create(&wm->id, op->type->srna, op->properties, &ptr);
00524 
00525     /* main draw call */
00526     uiDefAutoButsRNA(layout, &ptr, sound_mixdown_draw_check_prop, '\0');
00527 }
00528 #endif // WITH_AUDASPACE
00529 
00530 static void SOUND_OT_mixdown(wmOperatorType *ot)
00531 {
00532 #ifdef WITH_AUDASPACE
00533     static EnumPropertyItem format_items[] = {
00534         {AUD_FORMAT_U8, "U8", 0, "U8", "8 bit unsigned"},
00535         {AUD_FORMAT_S16, "S16", 0, "S16", "16 bit signed"},
00536         {AUD_FORMAT_S24, "S24", 0, "S24", "24 bit signed"},
00537         {AUD_FORMAT_S32, "S32", 0, "S32", "32 bit signed"},
00538         {AUD_FORMAT_FLOAT32, "F32", 0, "F32", "32 bit floating point"},
00539         {AUD_FORMAT_FLOAT64, "F64", 0, "F64", "64 bit floating point"},
00540         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00541 
00542     static EnumPropertyItem container_items[] = {
00543 #ifdef WITH_FFMPEG
00544         {AUD_CONTAINER_AC3, "AC3", 0, "ac3", "Dolby Digital ATRAC 3"},
00545 #endif
00546         {AUD_CONTAINER_FLAC, "FLAC", 0, "flac", "Free Lossless Audio Codec"},
00547 #ifdef WITH_FFMPEG
00548         {AUD_CONTAINER_MATROSKA, "MATROSKA", 0, "mkv", "Matroska"},
00549         {AUD_CONTAINER_MP2, "MP2", 0, "mp2", "MPEG-1 Audio Layer II"},
00550         {AUD_CONTAINER_MP3, "MP3", 0, "mp3", "MPEG-2 Audio Layer III"},
00551 #endif
00552         {AUD_CONTAINER_OGG, "OGG", 0, "ogg", "Xiph.Org Ogg Container"},
00553         {AUD_CONTAINER_WAV, "WAV", 0, "wav", "Waveform Audio File Format"},
00554         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00555

00559         {AUD_CODEC_AC3, "AC3", 0, "AC3", "Dolby Digital ATRAC 3"},

00562 #ifdef WITH_FFMPEG
00563         {AUD_CODEC_MP2, "MP2", 0, "MP2", "MPEG-1 Audio Layer II"},
00564         {AUD_CODEC_MP3, "MP3", 0, "MP3", "MPEG-2 Audio Layer III"},
00565 #endif
00566         {AUD_CODEC_PCM, "PCM", 0, "PCM", "Pulse Code Modulation (RAW)"},
00567         {AUD_CODEC_VORBIS, "VORBIS", 0, "Vorbis", "Xiph.Org Vorbis Codec"},
00568         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00569 
00570 #endif // WITH_AUDASPACE
00571 
00572     /* identifiers */
00573     ot->name = "Mixdown";
00574     ot->description = "Mixes the scene's audio to a sound file";
00575     ot->idname = "SOUND_OT_mixdown";
00576 
00577     /* api callbacks */
00578     ot->exec = sound_mixdown_exec;

00598 /* ******************************************************* */
00599 
00600 static int sound_poll(bContext *C)
00601 {
00602     Editing* ed = CTX_data_scene(C)->ed;
00603 
00604     if (!ed || !ed->act_seq || ed->act_seq->type != SEQ_SOUND)
00605         return 0;
00606 
00607     return 1;
00608 }
00609 /********************* pack operator *********************/
00610 
00611 static int sound_pack_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00612 {
00613     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00614     Editing* ed = CTX_data_scene(C)->ed;
00615     bSound* sound;
00616 
00617     if (!ed || !ed->act_seq || ed->act_seq->type != SEQ_SOUND)
00618         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00619 
00620     sound = ed->act_seq->sound;
00621 
00622     if (!sound || sound->packedfile)
00623         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00624 
00625     sound->packedfile= newPackedFile(op->reports, sound->name, ID_BLEND_PATH(bmain, &sound->id));
00626     sound_load(CTX_data_main(C), sound);
00627 
00628     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00629 }
00630 
00631 static void SOUND_OT_pack(wmOperatorType *ot)
00632 {
00633     /* identifiers */
00634     ot->name = "Pack Sound";
00635     ot->description = "Pack the sound into the current blend file";
00636     ot->idname = "SOUND_OT_pack";
00637 
00638     /* api callbacks */
00639     ot->exec = sound_pack_exec;
00640     ot->poll = sound_poll;
00641 
00642     /* flags */
00643     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00644 }
00645 
00646 /********************* unpack operator *********************/
00647 
00648 static int sound_unpack_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00649 {
00650     int method= RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "method");
00651     bSound* sound= NULL;
00652 
00653     /* find the suppplied image by name */
00654     if (RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "id")) {
00655         char sndname[MAX_ID_NAME-2];
00656         RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "id", sndname);
00657         sound = BLI_findstring(&CTX_data_main(C)->sound, sndname, offsetof(ID, name) + 2);
00658     }
00659 
00660     if (!sound || !sound->packedfile)
00661         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00662 
00663     if (G.fileflags & G_AUTOPACK)
00664         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_WARNING, "AutoPack is enabled, so image will be packed again on file save");
00665 
00666     unpackSound(CTX_data_main(C), op->reports, sound, method);
00667 
00668     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00669 }
00670 
00671 static int sound_unpack_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
00672 {
00673     Editing* ed = CTX_data_scene(C)->ed;
00674     bSound* sound;
00675 
00676     if (RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "id"))
00677         return sound_unpack_exec(C, op);
00678 
00679     if (!ed || !ed->act_seq || ed->act_seq->type != SEQ_SOUND)
00680         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00681 
00682     sound = ed->act_seq->sound;
00683 
00684     if (!sound || !sound->packedfile)
00685         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00686 
00687     if (G.fileflags & G_AUTOPACK)
00688         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_WARNING, "AutoPack is enabled, so image will be packed again on file save");
00689 
00690     unpack_menu(C, "SOUND_OT_unpack", sound->id.name+2, sound->name, "sounds", sound->packedfile);
00691 
00692     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00693 }
00694 
00695 static void SOUND_OT_unpack(wmOperatorType *ot)
00696 {
00697     /* identifiers */
00698     ot->name = "Unpack Sound";
00699     ot->description = "Unpack the sound to the samples filename";
00700     ot->idname = "SOUND_OT_unpack";
00701 
00702     /* api callbacks */
00703     ot->exec = sound_unpack_exec;
00704     ot->invoke = sound_unpack_invoke;
00705     ot->poll = sound_poll;
00706 
00707     /* flags */
00708     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00709 
00710     /* properties */
00711     RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "method", unpack_method_items, PF_USE_LOCAL, "Method", "How to unpack");
00712     RNA_def_string(ot->srna, "id", "", MAX_ID_NAME-2, "Sound Name", "Sound datablock name to unpack"); /* XXX, weark!, will fail with library, name collisions */
00713 }

00717 void ED_operatortypes_sound(void)
00718 {
00719     WM_operatortype_append(SOUND_OT_open);
00720     WM_operatortype_append(SOUND_OT_open_mono);
00721     WM_operatortype_append(SOUND_OT_mixdown);
00722     WM_operatortype_append(SOUND_OT_pack);
00723     WM_operatortype_append(SOUND_OT_unpack);
00724     WM_operatortype_append(SOUND_OT_update_animation_flags);
00725     WM_operatortype_append(SOUND_OT_bake_animation);
00726 }
